# system_par
M = 2
K1 = 3
K2 = 2
m_ls = np.array([1,1.2,1,1.7])
K_intra = np.array([1.7,1.7,1.7,1.7,1.4,1.4,1.4,1.4,1,1])

# driving_par
T_amp = 1
w0 = 0.2
sigma = 1
